title: How to Get 99 Lives in New Super Mario Bros DS

steps.title: Finish the level like you would do normally, except when you get near the flag at the end, there should be a Koopa Troopa coming down the stairs.
steps.content: Finish the level like you would do normally, except when you get near the flag at the end, there should be a Koopa Troopa coming down the stairs.

steps.title: Jump on it as it is coming down the third to last stair.
steps.content: Jump on it as it is coming down the third to last stair. If this is done correctly, you can keep jumping on it to build the points.

steps.title: Finished.
steps.content: Finished. After you build the points as high as it can go, it will start to give you one-ups. You should be able to take your hands off the DS and watch your lives go up. You can get up to 99 lives. Keep in mind that you may lose lives through time out.

steps.title: Go to the level where you go underground, the one infested with the Bob-bombs.
steps.content: Go to the level where you go underground, the one infested with the Bob-bombs. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the place where the bombs come out of the pipes.
steps.content: Go to the place where the bombs come out of the pipes. Place the bomb where under the pipe.

steps.title: Kill the Koopa right next to it and make it shell-dash.
steps.content: Kill the Koopa right next to it and make it shell-dash. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wait for a spiny to start dashing on its own after you did the trick with the Koopa.
steps.content: Wait for a spiny to start dashing on its own after you did the trick with the Koopa.

steps.title: Keep following it but do not touch it, or it will start the process again.
steps.content: Keep following it but do not touch it, or it will start the process again. It will keep killing bombs. Beware that you could lose lives by running out of time.

steps.title: Hit the block with the Mega Mushroom inside.
steps.content: Hit the block with the Mega Mushroom inside.

steps.title: Wait until it is about to fall down the pit.
steps.content: Wait until it is about to fall down the pit. Collect it before then.

steps.title: Rush to the flagpole and then knock it down.
steps.content: Rush to the flagpole and then knock it down.

steps.title: This will get you five one-ups.
steps.content: This will get you five one-ups.

steps.title: Keep playing the level over and over again.
steps.content: Keep playing the level over and over again.

steps.title: Jump on the red Koopa Troopa 1 time, hold the Koopa by holding the X or Y button.
steps.content: Jump on the red Koopa Troopa 1 time, hold the Koopa by holding the X or Y button.

steps.title: Run to the yellow pipe with the Koopa and release the X or Y button to release the Koopa.
steps.content: Run to the yellow pipe with the Koopa and release the X or Y button to release the Koopa. After you score up to 8000, it should say 1UP.
